      a list of the cards

    • drawDestinationCard

      public abstract boolean drawDestinationCard() throws DeckEmptyException, WrongPlayerException
      The Bot will choose the number of short dest card to draw and give back the one he doesn't want
      Returns:
      true if the draw succeed
      Throws:
      DeckEmptyException - if the destination deck is empty
      WrongPlayerException

      true if the draw succeed
      Throws:
      DeckEmptyException - if the wagon deck is empty
